divs: Sighting DetailsWe seen a red and white flashing orb in the south part of the sky about the size of a dime. It was stationary for about 45 minutes to an hour and slowly fainted.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Decatur
There were no other sightings in Decatur on or around May 26th 2012
